name: Arcade Air Hockey & Bowling
description:
Arcade Air Hockey & Bowling™ offers fully featured 3D versions of Air Hockey & Bowling, with smooth analogue control and realistic gameplay. Win trophies and unlock new equipment in the World Tour career mode, or challenge a friend to play.

- Intuitive controls - with smooth analogue movement

- 2-player multiplayer - play with friends and family in versus play modes

- Varied game modes - including Practice, Versus, Custom Tournament and Season

- Season mode - become the World Ranked No.1 player; winning extra player rewards including new equipment and special trophies

- Sophisticated AI - opponent AI designed to play a realistic 'human' game, from amateur level through to top ranking
